about_the_game:
Kill Hordes of Enemies!

Thousands of enemies will come to stop your war against Evil.

Choose the best upgrades for your spells!

Every spell has 9 unique upgrade combination on how they work.

Explore the maps for Ancient Wizard Artifacts

Find artifacts like the First Spark which casts an all penetrating ring of Fireballs after charging up by casting fireball with your Wizard.


Or the One Goblin's Toe which can cause abrupt explosions of gold upon destroying items on the ground.

Charge the Portal up by collecting souls to Advance to the next Stage

Unlock and Master every Wizard fighting the for the cause!

Earn mastery with the Wizards to get some extra fighting chance against the Evil hordes.

Masters of One.

Do you want to become the Wizard of Lightning? Choose the one with extra knowledge in Lightning magic!

Upgrades!

In the good old roguelike fashion: spend your gold on upgrades to have a better chance at keeping the Evil at bay.




Do you want more? We want more! Get in touch with us on discord or the Steam forums and lets discuss the future of the game.

name: Wizards of Chaos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1600 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 960 GTX or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Just have something that does noises
  • Additional Notes: 1080p 30-60 fps (highly demanding lategame, no guarantees)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3600 or equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2060 GTX or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Piece of flappy metal sheet
  • Additional Notes: 2k/4k 120/60 fps (highly demanding lategame, no guarantees)

short_description: Become the Wizard who brings Chaos and Destruction to the world of Evil before It gets you! Destroy and loot everything in this Action Roguelike RPG. Find Artifacts, learn spells and expand your game with every achievement. Control your Wizard with only your mouse or one stick.
